reviews.name: Kai
reviews.text:
I visited Asiaa Dental Clinic yesterday for a teeth whitening session, along with scaling, polishing, and an additional tooth filing procedure. My friend recommended me as she was quite pleased with their treatment. I was attended to by Dr Thasha, and I must sayâ€”Iâ€™m thoroughly impressed with both her and the teamâ€™s overall service and attitude.

Dr Thasha was patient and attentive, clearly explaining each step of the procedures beforehand. Throughout the session, she and the staff consistently checked in to ensure I was comfortable and doing well.

During the second stage of the whitening treatment, I experienced an unexpected reactionâ€”intense numbness and a burning sensation on my lips, which left me panicking as it was something Iâ€™d never felt before. The staff responded immediately, informing Dr Thasha, who attended to me promptly. She remained calm and professional, reassuring me that some patients may have such reactions when the lips come into contact with the chemical. She also explained that the severity of the reaction can vary between individuals. My lips were visibly swollen and appeared burned by the end of the session, but Dr Thasha comforted me that it will disappear after 1-2 days and reduced the duration for the final stage of the treatment to prevent further discomfort. She also told me to contact them if the condition doesn't improve.

Unfortunately, shortly after the session, I experienced sudden and intense sharp pain in the bottom front row of my teeth. Dr Thasha checked in on me, and I informed her about the pain. She kindly provided ibuprofen, which helped relieve the pain slightly. I was also given fluoride mousse and a soothing gel for my teeth and lips to bring home for aftercare.

What truly touched me was the follow-upâ€”a WhatsApp message from the clinic the next day to check if I was feeling better. Their care and concern really stood out to me.

While the reaction and pain I experienced were likely due to my naturally sensitive teeth, I am still very pleased with the service provided. I highly recommend Asiaa Dental Clinic for their professionalism, warm service, and affordable pricing. The location is also relatively close to KSL (about 10mins walk), although do note that certain part of the clinic is currently undergoing renovation.

Thank you Dr Thasha and the team :)

description:
Asiaa Dental Clinic stands as a prominent provider of dental healthcare within the vibrant cityscape of Johor, earning accolades for its patient-centered service and professional excellence. Its strategic location in the heart of the city ensures that both local residents and visitors have convenient access to top-tier dental care.

From the moment patients step into Asiaa Dental Clinic, they are welcomed by a team renowned for their friendliness and commitment to clear communication. Testimonials frequently highlight the exceptional care provided by Dr. Tasha and her team, who are celebrated for their kindness and expertise. The clinic's environment is designed to put patients at ease, making dental visits less daunting and more pleasant.

Reflecting the community's sentiments, Asiaa Dental Clinic is often recommended for its quality service and amiable staff. Open every day of the week, the clinic demonstrates its dedication to accommodating the schedules of its diverse clientele. With a reputation that resonates throughout Johor, this clinic remains a trusted destination for those seeking dental health services marked by competence and cordiality.

title: Pallx Dental Clinic - Platinum Elite Invisalign Provider
address: 15 A, Jalan Harimau Tarum, Taman Abad, 80250 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia

reviews.name: RAFRAF Baker
reviews.text: Love the clinic setting, very warm and cozy. Dr Rachel is wonderful. She is very thorough and explained everything very well. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Epe Marjory
reviews.text:
I recently got Emax veneers done at Pallx Dental Clinic with Dr. Reshma Kumar, and Iâ€™m honestly so happy with the whole experience! Dr. Reshma was super kind,Friendly and really listened to what I wanted. She made the process smooth and comfortable from start to finish and the results are amazing!ğŸ˜ My teeth look so natural and clean, exactly how I hoped they would.

The clinic has a nice vibe very clean and modern and the staff were friendly and helpful every step of the way. If youâ€™re thinking about getting veneers or any dental work, I highly recommend checking them out. Thank you, Dr. Reshma and team!

reviews.name: Jesse Jacintha
reviews.text: Highly recommend this clinic, for kids especially. Dr Rachel was very gentle and explained everything very well. The service was excellent from booking an appointment till paying the bill. The charges was quite reasonable too.

reviews.name: B J
reviews.text: My husband did an Emax Overlay as his molar was chipped. Dr Kyaarthini is very professional and she explains your conditions and the options available clearly. The staffs are polite and respectful. The clinic is also very well maintained. Its near to CIQ so its only a short ride away.

reviews.name: Priyesh Patel
reviews.text:
I had an amazing experience at Pallx Dental Clinic. From the moment I walked in, the staff was warm, welcoming, and extremely professional. The clinic is clean, modern, and well-equipped, making me feel comfortable right away.

Dr. Reshma is truly exceptional. She took the time to explain everything in detail, answered all my questions, and made sure I felt at ease throughout the procedure. Their gentle approach and expertise made my visit completely painless.

I highly recommend Dr Reshma at Pallx Dental Clinic to anyone looking for top-quality dental care. I finally found a dentist I can trust, and Iâ€™ll definitely be returning for all my future dental needs!

reviews.name: Jia Min Goh
reviews.text:
Visited Pallx Dental clinic after being recommended by a friend, and I must say. This is the best dental Iâ€™ve ever been to.  We were greeted by really friendly staffs as we entered the clean & nicely decorated clinic. My Dr is Dr. Reshma Siva Kumar. Sheâ€™s super gentle, patient and friendly throughout the entire consultation and procedure.
Really really recommended. They really made the visit really amazing. 5 stars!!

reviews.name: shu yem Lim
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience at Pallx Dental Clinic! Dr. Reshma is incredibly professional, attentive, and made me feel at ease throughout the entire visit. The clinic staff is so friendly and welcoming, making the whole process smooth and stress-free. The service was top-notch, and I left feeling confident in my treatment. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for great dental care with a personal touch!"
